Title: Ett nytt liv
Writer: Peter Arrhenius, Maj Sjöwall, Per Wahlöö
Actors: Peter Haber, Kristofer Hivju, Jennie Silfverhjelm
Plot: After a period of rehabilitation, Martin Beck is back on duty. He and the rest of the group are thrown into a case where the body of a notorious Danish professional criminal is found in the water at Liljeholmen.
